19#ifndef _FILE_LIST_H
20#define _FILE_LIST_H
21
22#include "str-list.h"
23
24
25#ifdef __cplusplus
26extern "C" {
27#endif
28
29
30/* Read list of filenames from a file.
31 One filename per line. Lines starting with # and whitespace lines are
32 ignored. Trailing whitespace is removed. */
33extern string_list_ty *read_names_from_file (const char *file_name);
34
35
36#ifdef __cplusplus
37}
38#endif
39
40
41#endif /* _FILE_LIST_H */
